title: This Week Is Your Last Chance Until 2025 To See Venus At Its Brightest

title: Using Images To Train Large Language Models
description: James Glass is a Senior Research Scientist at MIT. With a background in electrical engineering and computer science, his research focuses on unsupervised speech processing, and spoken language understanding through machine learning.

title: Building A Microscope That Magnifies Motion
description: William T. Freeman is the Thomas and Gerd Perkins Professor of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science at MIT. His research spans mid-level vision, audio, and computational photography.

title: French Win First Regatta Race Of The 37th America’s Cup
description: Team Orient Express won the first competitive race of the initial regatta of the 37th America's Cup. Six entrants are now racing south of Barcelona in Spain.

title: Spider-Man 2’s Fast Travel On PS5 Looks Absolutely Insane

title: Essay Explaining ‘Why Geologists Love To Lick Rocks’ wins Ig Noble Prize
